an7.83:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā upāli yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.83:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā upāli bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.83:5.1: “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
an7.83:5.3: ‘ime dhammā na ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī’ti;
an7.83:5.6: Ye ca kho tvaṃ, upāli, dhamme jāneyyāsi:
an7.83:5.7: ‘ime dhammā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī’ti;
